member.name: F:CrossPlatformLibrary.Geolocation.DateTimeExtensions.Epoch
member.summary: Epoch is a UTC DateTime value from January 1, 1970.

member.name: M:CrossPlatformLibrary.Geolocation.DateTimeExtensions.GetTimestamp(System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns a DateTimeOffset which is Epoch + time.
member.param: Time value in milliseconds (starting on January 1, 1970).
